comment: An Axiom of Choice equivalent. Given a family ` x ` of mutually disjoint nonempty sets, there exists a set ` y ` containing exactly one member from each set in the family. Theorem 6M(4) of [Enderton] p. 151. (Contributed by NM, 14-May-2004.)
